short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Knightley TREASURE provides discounts on software to the startup ecosystem.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically find and apply founder coupon codes when you buy startup products online!
Love saving money and collecting a lil’ booty? Just wait ‘til you try Knightley Treasure.
We automatically search for and apply coupons when you shop online.
One click and we test different codes and apply the best one to your cart.
Throw in exclusive Treasure promo codes and offers for even more ways to save.
It all adds up to a suite of shopping features that takes the guesswork out of buying.
Treasure is one of the growing products in the Knightley Suite of Founder Tools over at Knightley.co
-------------------------------------------------------
By using this add-on, you agree to the Knightley Terms & Conditions available at http://knightley.co/tos
Disclaimer:
This extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout or you can set up a filter in Adblock Plus or similar ad blocker tools like AdBlock, uBlock or Adblock Pro.
